Reviews.Title: un friendly product
Reviews.Author: Keith North
Reviews.Content: I had high expectations when I ordered this product. I should have known. You get what you pay for. What was sent was opposite of the picture. Thats ok. But it came in deciphered English from China, through Taiwan, by way of South America. Instructions were impossible. Help line was in India, go figure. Anyway sent it back got a full refund. Thank you. On to to my next one. There is always hope.

ProductInfo.Features:
* H.264 Hardware Compression
* Recording Mode: Continuous/Scheduled/Motion
* PTZ via RS-485 Port
* Video Input / Output: BNC 4/BNC 1
* Audio Input / Output: RCA 4/BNC 1
ProductInfo.Name: ZMODO 4 Channel CCTV Security Surveillance Video Recorder DVR - 3G Mobile 500GB HD DVR
